title: Tax Administration 2019
abstract: This report looks at how modern tax administration systems work across 58 advanced and emerging economies, highlighting key trends and recent innovations. Based on an extensive data set, surveys and examples, this edition shows how tax administrations are increasingly moving to e-administration and using a range of technology tools, data sources and analytics to manage tax compliance and reduce administrative burdens. The goal is to share good practices to improve the individual and collective design and functioning of tax administration systems worldwide.
